subject: Short 30 second form
body:
Your credit history doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE cash to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you THIS EVENING (hurry, this deal will expire TONIGHT):
$299,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest payments!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill out this short form... 
Don't worry about approval, your your credit report will not disqualify you!!
http://urflkght.com/
